title: Bloomberg Markets: Krumpelman on Taking Advantage of Pullback
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Krumpelman on Taking Advantage of Pullback
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jeffrey Krumpelman Chief Investment Officer RiverPoint Capital Management Discussing what he sees as "reasonable valuations" in the markets and stocks he likes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
